item.name: Magical Melody Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Presidential blue is the background for this happy birthday greeting. A delightful bouquet of multicolored balloons stretches up swirling and dodging little golden stars. "Happy Birthday" is written in large cursive across the front of the card. The message continues at the bottom of the card and says, "To You Happy Birthday." Additional golden foiled stars appear at the sides of the card.


Message: Wishing you all the best on this wonderful day and throughout the year ahead.

item.name: Faint Flourish Anniversary Card
item.short_description:
This beautiful anniversary card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to recognize employees for their years of hard work.
Message: Thank you for your hard work and dedication to the team!

item.name: Faint Flourish Get Well
item.short_description:
This beautiful get well card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to share your hopes for a healthier tomorrow.
Message: Sending many warm thoughts and good wishes.

item.name: Faint Flourish Congratulations
item.short_description:
This beautiful congratulations card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to recognize others for their accomplishments.
Message: Your efforts have been greatly appreciated

item.name: Faint Flourish Sympathy
item.short_description:
This beautiful sympathy card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to share your heartfelt sentiments with others in their times of need.
Message: With sincere condolences in your time of sorrow

item.name: Faint Flourish Appreciation
item.short_description:
This beautiful thank you card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to share your appreciation with those who make your business possible.
Message:Thanks for a job well done

item.name: Faint Flourish Birthday Card
item.short_description:
This beautiful birthday card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to share warm sentiments and encourage celebration on such a special day.
Message: Best wishes to you on your birthday and for many Birthdays to come.

item.name: Worldly Wishes Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Birthday wishes from across the world come together as a cheerful background on this birthday card featuring a glowing birthday cake. "Happy Birthday" appears in silver foil below.
Message: Best wishes on your birthday and throughout the coming year

item.name: Birthday Swirls Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Colorful painted swirls dance across this bright white card, giving your birthday wishes an eye-catching backdrop. Gold foil accents add to the card's remarkable appeal.
Message: Wishing you all the best on this wonderful day and throughout the year ahead

item.name: Thoughtful Wishes Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Celebrate their big day with this thoughtful birthday card encouraging the honoree to "Make a Wish!" Exciting colors and sparkling silver foil add extra enthusiasm to this greeting.
Message: May you have an unforgettable day filled with happiness.

item.name: Color Craze Birthday Card
item.short_description:
People go crazy for color, which makes this greeting card perfect for starting up a celebration! Brilliant colors shine brightly against a black background.
Message: May the coming year bring the best of everything. Happy Birthday!

item.name: Star Treatment Birthday Card
item.short_description:
An elegant birthday greeting printed on matte white paper stands out with "Happy" printed in blue foil and "Birthday" written in a script font on a band of blue in silver foil. A trail of tiny blue and silver foil stars and a silver deckle edge add the perfect finishing touch.
Message: Have a wonderful day!

item.name: Silver Patterns Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Surprise your employees, clients or associates with this stunning birthday card. Beautiful silver patterns are elegantly embossed on each balloon above "happy birthday" in coordinating silver foil.
Message: Wishing you all the best on this wonderful day and throughout the year ahead.

item.name: Birthday Flair Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Send a birthday card that celebrates their big day with a flash of bright colors, sparkly gold foil accents and a bold greeting with flair.
Message: Best wishes for a wonderful day!

item.name: Star Power Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Help recipients power up for their big day with this brown birthday card featuring colorful stars floating above "happy birthday" in gold lettering
Message: May your wishes come true and your day be full of happiness.

item.name: Celebrate and Party! Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Send your best wishes for a birthday party that will be a grand celebration with this festive, brightly colored birthday card. Silver foil adds a sparkling glint of shine.
Message: Best wishes for a wonderful birthday!

item.name: Shine Through Thank You Card
item.short_description:
Metallic silver foil and bright, bold colors on help your many thanks shine through to recipients with this contemporary thank you card on glossy paper.
Message: Just extending our sincere appreciation!

item.name: With Appreciation Thank You Card
item.short_description:
Bright design elements against a dark background give this thank you card incredible dimension. Impress recipients with your willingness to share your appreciation and your unique choice of greeting card.
Message: Just extending our sincere appreciation!

item.name: Scripted Thank You Card
item.short_description:
Show your appreciation with this sophisticated ivory greeting card featuring a gold embossed plate with "Thank You" in scripted lettering and a flourish design in the background.
Message: Thanks for a job well done!

item.name: Gilded Detail Thank you Card
item.short_description:
Express your appreciation in words and style. "Thank you" embossed in gold foil coordinates beautifully with the ornate pattern featured below it on this thank you card.
Message: We appreciate the opportunity to be able to serve you.

item.name: Marbled Thank You Card
item.short_description:
A marbled background lends truly professional appeal to this thank you card featuring a lovely color combination of rich green and smooth ecru.
Message: Thanks for a job well done!

item.name: Floral Silhouette Thank You Card
item.short_description:
Send your thanks with this pretty floral thank you card featuring vivid purples, pinks and greens.
Message: Just extending our sincere appreciation!

item.name: Sentiments Echoed Thank You Card
item.short_description:
"Thank You" appears boldly in white on this teal thank you card. The message is reverberated through shadows and silhouettes in the background, allowing you to send multiple thank yous in just one card.
Message: Your efforts have been greatly appreciated!

item.name: For Everything Thank You Card
item.short_description:
Express your gratitude with this "Thank You" card featuring bright gold foil over a royal blue bar on a field of earth-tone vertical stripes.
Message: Just extending our sincere appreciation!

item.name: All About You Thank You Card
item.short_description:
The "You" in "Thank You" is highlighted in a brilliant shade of green, reminding the recipient that he/she is one of a kind and deserves appreciation.
Message: Many thanks for your friendship and goodwill. We sincerely appreciate your business!

item.name: Celebrate and Party! Birthday Card
item.short_description:
Send your best wishes for a birthday party that will be a grand celebration with this festive, brightly colored birthday card. Silver foil adds a sparkling glint of shine.
Message: Best wishes for a wonderful birthday!

item.name: For Everything Thank You Card
item.short_description:
Express your gratitude with this "Thank You" card featuring bright gold foil over a royal blue bar on a field of earth-tone vertical stripes.
Message: Just extending our sincere appreciation!

item.name: Thank You For Making It Happen
item.short_description:
What a wonderful why to say "Thank You" with this striking picture of a lush forest separated into two by a powerful waterfall.
Message: Your efforts have been greatly appreciated!

item.name: Thank You
item.short_description:
Say "Thank You" with this classy lilac, plum, olive, and silver foil pinstriped card. Thank you is printed in purple script within a white box.
Message: Thanks For A Job Well Done!

item.name: Burgundy Thank You
item.short_description:
Show your appreciation with this sophisticated Burgundy Thank You card. Featuring a burgundy background with a subdued daisy pattern down the middle. Framed on both sides by two lines of gold foil.
Message:We Apperciate The Opportunity To Be Able To Serve You

item.name: Thank You In Blue Foil
item.short_description:
Say "Thanks" With this elengant foil stamped card. Esse Pearlized Silver stock both inside and out.
Message:Thanks For A Job Well Done!

item.name: Inspirational Thank You
item.short_description:
Show your apprecaition with this busy "Inspirational Thank You" card. The different fonts and colors convey a sincere and heartfelt thanks!
Message:Thanks For A Job Well Done!

item.name: Thanks
item.short_description:
Show your thanks with this elegant card. Shades of rich brown make up the background of this card that is adorned with an attractive embossed gold swirl design and matching script font that expresses your “Thank You”.
Message:We Appreciate The Opportunity To Be Able To Serve You

item.name: Textured Gold Thank You
item.short_description:
This professional business thank you card is an ideal way of showing your appreciation. The textured gold background is framed in a rich navy blue while an embossed navy blue banner.
Message:I appreciate the opportunity to serve you. Please call me whenever I can be of further assistance.

item.name: Faint Flourish Appreciation-Blank
item.short_description:
This beautiful thank you card with elegant flourish design is a wonderful way to share your appreciation with those who make your business possible.
Message:Thanks for a job well done

Happy Holidays
item.short_description: Beautiful black with faint snow flacks

item.name: Greeting of the Seasons
item.short_description: Classy Dark Navy Blue with swirl script

item.name: Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year
item.short_description: Elegant Blue card with beautiful script

item.name: Classy Season's Greetings
item.short_description: Very elegant card. What better way to wish a happy new year

item.name: Happy Valentines Day
item.short_description: Happy is in red, Valentine's in pink, and Day is in red again. Blank inside to add your own personal message.

item.name: Blue Heart Valentine
item.short_description: Happy Valentine's Day is printed in white inside a big white heart on this dark blue valentine. Blank inside to add your own personal message.
